pageContext.claim: “I was asking a pilot, 'What do you think is better: This one? This one? That one?' Talking about Russian planes, Chinese planes. He said, 'Well, the advantage we have is you can't see it.' So when we're fighting, they can't see us.”
pageContext.analysis: Both Russia and China have stealth fighters though the U.S. has significantly more experience building stealth planes.
